extensionDescription.message: Amagbar Facebook ad iεzel armud-inek n Facebook ɣef urmud-inek web akken ur ittaǧǧa ara Facebook ad ak-iḍfer beṛṛa n usmel-ines s ttawil n inagan n tuqqna tis kraḍ.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

in-fbc-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

in-fbc-p1.message: Facebook yezmer tura ad k-yeḍfeṛ deg usmel-a. Akken ad tekkseḍ asmel-a seg Facebook Container, fren ismal deg Facebook Container sakin kkes-it seg tebdert.

on-facebook-subhead.message: Deg Facebook akked ismal i d-yeɛzel Facebook Container.
on-facebook-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

on-facebook-p1.message: Tignit-a ad tban deg ufeggag n tensa n Firefox ticki terziḍ ɣer yismal yessefrak Facebook neɣ ismal i terniḍ ɣer Facebook container.
on-facebook-p1.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

on-facebook-p2.message: Ismal-a ḥwaǧen ad kecmen ɣer tmagit-ik Facebook (neɣ akken ad ẓren anwa-k) akken ad lḥun. Ayagi yemmal-d dakken daɣen ula d Facebook yezmer ad yeḍfeṛ meṛṛa ayen i txeddmeḍ deg yismal-a.
on-facebook-p2.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop up when the user is on Facebook.

notOnFacebookHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

notOnFacebookText.message: Asmel-agi yella beṛṛa n umagbar Facebook. Aya ad yessiwɛeṛ i Facebook ad k-yeḍfeṛ deg Web.
notOnFacebookText.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

onUnknownSiteHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on an "unknown" website - e.g., about:newtab. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

facebookContainer.description: This is the name of the extension, and appears at the top of all onboarding panels. Please do not translate "Facebook Container".

onboarding1-subhead.description: This is the subhead of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding1-p1.message: Facebook yezmer ad yeḍfeṛ tunigin-ik beṛṛa n Facebook.com. Amedya, ticki llant tqeffalin ḥemmleɣ neɣ Bḍu n Facebook, yezmer ad yeḍfeṛ anida tettedduḍ — ɣas ɣef yiseftar ur teḥmileḍ neɣ ur tebḍiḍ.
onboarding1-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding1-p2.message: Facebook Container ad yeɛzel Facebook seg Web. Ihi ad s-yewɣeṛ  i Facebook akken ad k-yeḍfeṛ srid.

onboarding2-subhead.message: Deg Facebook akked yismal i yeɛzel Facebook Container
onboarding2-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding2-alt.message: Tignit n talast n Facebook Container
onboarding2-alt.description: This is alternative text for the icon in the second onboarding panel

onboarding2-p1.message: Tignit-a ad tban deg ufeggag n Firefox ticki terziḍ ɣer yismal, am Facebook.com, i yellan deg Facebook Container.
onboarding2-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the second onboarding panel.

onboarding2-p2.message: Ismal-a ḥwaǧen ad kecmen ɣer tmagit-ik Facebook (neɣ akken ad ẓren anwa-k) akken ad lḥun. Ayagi yemmal-d dakken daɣen ula d Facebook yezmer ad yeḍfeṛ meṛṛa ayen i txeddmeḍ deg yismal-a.
onboarding2-p2.description: This is the second paragraph of the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding4-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-p1.message: Xas ma ur telliḍ ara deg Facebook, Facebook izmer ad k-yeḍfeṛ srid. Tiqeffalin ara k-yeǧǧen ad tsuffɣeḍ tiɣawsiwin deg Facebook neɣ ad teqqneḍ ɣer yismal web s umiḍan-ik Facebook gebren ineḍfaṛen. Facebook Container ad isewḥel ineḍfaṛen-a daɣen ad d-yesken tignit n ẓẓerb akken ad ak-d-iban anida ttwakksen ineḍfaṛen.
onboarding4-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-img.message: Tugna-a ad tesken amek ad tban tignit n talast Facebook Container deg usebter rrif n uferdis Ḥemmleɣ n Facebook.
onboarding4-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p1.message: Akken ad teqqneḍ ɣer yismal-nniḍen s Facebook, issefk ad tserseḍ ismal-a deg umagbar Facebook. Tekki ɣef tignit n ẓẓerb sakin fren "Sireg asmel deg Facebook Container" ukesser.
onboarding5-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-img.message: Tugna-a temmal-d taqeffalt deg ugalis ara yeǧǧen timerna n usmel ɣer Facebook Container.
onboarding5-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p2.message: Aya ad k-yeǧǧ ad teqqneḍ s Facebook, maca ad yeǧǧ Facebook ad yeḍfeṛ armud-ik ɣef usmel-a.
onboarding5-p2.description: This is the second paragraph on the fifth onboarding panel.

btn-allow.description: This is a button to allows users to whitelist the domain, adding it to the Facebook container.

btn-cancel.description: This is a button to cancel out of the onboarding panel.

btn-next.description: This is a button to continue to the next onboarding panel.

btn-back.description: This is a button that returns the user to the previous onboarding panel.

btn-done.description: This is a button the user clicks to close out the panel when they have finished reading the text.

btn-arrow-back.description: This is alternative text for the back arrow button.

btn-arrow-forward.message: Ddu ad teẓreḍ amek iteddu Facebook Container
btn-arrow-forward.description: This is alternative text for the arrow icon next to the "How Facebook Container Works" link

no-trackers-subhead.message: Ulac aneḍfaṛ n Facebook i d-yettwafen

no-trackers-p1.message: Facebook Container ur d-yufi ara ineḍfaṛen n Facebook ɣef usebter-a. Maca asebter yezmer ad yegber anawen-nniḍen n yineḍfaṛen.

learn-more.description: This is a link that opens a page with more information about Facebook Container.

how-fbc-works.description: This is a button that opens the Facebook Container onboarding flow.

trackers-detected-subhead.description: This is a subhead, and it means that the add on has protected the user by blocking Facebook trackers.

trackers-detected-p1.message: Tiqeffalin Facebook i d-yettbanen deg yismal n tiɣin, isallen, d yismal-nniḍen gebrent inedfaṛen i d-yemmalen ayen wiɣer i trezzuḍ. Ɣas ma yella ur tseqdaceḍ ara tiqeffalin-a i uḥemmel neɣ i beṭṭu, ineḍfaṛen zemren yal tikkelt ad leqḍen isefka ɣef tunigin-ik. Facebook Container yessewḥal ineḍfaṛen-a.

trackers-detected-p2.message: Facebook Container yessewḥel ineḍfaṛen-a. Maca, ma tettekkaḍ ɣef yiwet seg tqeffalin-a, Facebook ad yizmir ad k-yeḍfeṛ.

trackers-detected-fence-alt.message: Talast n Facebook Container s waɣer
trackers-detected-fence-alt.description: This is alternative text describing the container fence icon.

sites-included.description: This is a header for the list of websites that are in the Facebook Container by default. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the language.

no-sites-added.description: This message is shown beneath the 'SITES YOU’VE ALLOWED' list header when no sites have been added to the contaner.

sites-allowed.description: This is the header for the list of sites the user has manually added into the Facebook Container. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the lanaguage.

sites-added-p1.message: Facebook Container ad yeɛzel ismal ittekkan ɣer Facebook deg temnaḍt s talast. Tzemreḍ ad ternuḍ ismal-nniḍen ɣer umagbar, maca ad teǧǧeḍ Facebook ad k-yeḍfeṛ ugar.

button-allow-site.description: Button text that allows sites to be added to the Facebook Container

button-remove-site.description: Button text that removes an already-added site from the Facebook Container to the default container

button-remove-site-tooltip.message: Imi asmel-a d ayla n Facebook, ur nezmir ara ad t-nekkes seg umagbar Facebook.
button-remove-site-tooltip.description: Tooltip that is displayed when hovering over the remove site button

remove-site-p1.message: Ma tekkseḍ asmel-a seg Facebook Container ayagi ur k-yettaǧǧa ara ad teqqneḍ ɣer-s ɣer zdat s tmahilt n Facebook daɣen inagan n tuqqna Facebook ad ttwakksen.

remove-site-p2.message: Ma tebɣiḍ ad teqqneḍ s Facebook tikkelt-nniḍen, ilaq ad ternuḍ asmel-a ɣer Facebook Container.

add-site-subhead.message: Sireg aḍfaṛ n Facebook ɣef usmel-a?

add-site-p1.message: Aya ad k-yeǧǧ ad teqqneḍ s Facebook, maca ad yeǧǧ Facebook ad yeḍfeṛ armud-ik ɣef usmel-a.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share.message: Facebook Container yessens taqeffalt ihi yessewḥel Facebook seg uḍfaṛ n tirza deg usebter-a.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-login.message: Facebook Container yessewḥel ineḍfaṛen n Facebook. MA tesqedceḍ tuqqna s Facebook deg usmel-a, Facebook ad yizmir ad k-yeḍfeṛ.

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p2.message: Ma tebɣiḍ ad tesqedceḍ tuqqna s Facebook, Facebook ad yizmir ad yeḍfeṛ armud-ik ɣef usmel-a. Ayagi yezmer ad imudd tallelt ɣef wudem-ik deg tudert-ik srid.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share-passive.message: Matetekkaḍ ɣef tqeffalt-a, Facebook ad yizmir ad k-yeḍfeṛ deg tirza n usmel-a.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-email.message: Ma yella tesseqdaceḍ tansa-inek·inem n yimayl n tidet dagi, Facebook yezmer ad ak·akem-yeḍfer. Sit i wakken ad teẓreḍ ugar.

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p2.message: Asel-a yezmer ad yebḍu tansa-inek·inem n yimayl akked Facebook, ayen ara yeǧǧen Facebook ad ak·akem-yeḍfer. Seqdec ameẓlu am Firefox Relay i wakken ad teffreḍ tansa-inek·inem n yimayl n tidet.
